about_the_game:
The Story of an everyday NEET, a guy with no job that goes into VR all day, but suddenly acquired magical powers...

WAIT. DID HE JUST TRANSFORMED INTO A MAGICAL GIRL!?!?

Kotomasho is an Adventure game with RPG elements inspired by Anime and the Gameboy Color Zelda games Link's Awakening and Oracle of Ages/Seasons while adding an RPG leveling system similar to The Legend of Zelda II.

The story follows Genji, a 21 year old NEET (acronym for Not in Education, Employment, or Training) Japanese guy who was to scared of finding a job after graduating so he had to spend the whole day playing in virtual reality. One day Genji receives a crystal medal-looking good luck charm from his sister and while logging into the VR world is transported into the realm of Dreams transformed into a magical girl!
